name: To Bring Back A Friend
description:
A short puzzle game about reviving your dead friend.

CONTROLS:
WASD/Arrow Keys: Move
Shift: Sprint
Enter/Space: Confirm/Interact
Escape: Exit/Cancel
You can also control the game with a mouse.

Made for Mini Jam 110: Sacrifice
